properties.entry: INSERT INTO FACILITY VALUES(FAC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '독서실', ?, SYSDATE, TO_DATE( ? || '/00:00:00', 'RRRR/MM/DD/HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(? || '/23:59:59', 'RRRR/MM/DD/HH24:MI:SS'), ?, DEFAULT)
SELECT TO_CHAR(FC_START, 'YYYY-fmMM-DD') AS FC_START FROM FACILITY WHERE U_NO = ? AND FC_NAME = '독서실' GROUP BY FC_START ORDER BY FC_START
